dct_title_s: Jerusalem in panorama / by S. N. Spyridon.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and pictorially. Map shows five historic walls, 1948 armistice lines, public bus services, and public conveniences. Map also shows Arab controlled territories, Jewish controlled territories, United Nations controlled territories, and areas designated "No mans land." "Edition Mary-Anne." Panel title includes quotation: "If I forget thee, O Jerusalem, let my right hand forget her cunning. (Psalm 137)." "Reproduction & publication strictly reserved by world copyright." "This plan is out of scale."
